name: archive-block
description: Display collections of content with filtering, sorting, and multiple layout options
author: PayloadKit
features: Two population modes: collection query or manual selection
Support for multiple collections (posts, pages, projects, products)
5 layout options: 2-col, 3-col, 4-col grid, list, and masonry
Configurable content display: images, excerpts, dates, authors, categories
Responsive design with hover effects and smooth transitions
Empty state handling with helpful messages
usage: Perfect for blog archives, portfolio galleries, product listings, or any content collection display.

preview.description: Archive block with configurable content layouts

setup.collections: This block works with any PayloadCMS collection. Ensure your collections have the fields referenced (title, slug, featuredImage, excerpt, categories, etc.)
setup.relationships: The block can reference categories collection for filtering. Make sure this collection exists if you plan to use category filtering.
